summary: Om Shastri, a recession victim comes to India to sell his ancestors property to clear is debt. On reaching he comes to know that selling the property will make his family homeless in India. Later he is kidnapped by goons thinking a rich NRI.
cast: Rajat Kapoor|Neha Dhupia|Sanjay Mishra|Manu Rishi Chadha|Pragati Pandey|Brijendra Kala|Sushil Pandey|Sumit Nijhawan|Amit Sial|Surendra Rajan|Devender Chaudhry|Amole Gupte|Roopesh Thapliyal|Dinesh Nag|Kuldeep Sareen|V. title: Phas Gaye Re Obama
